channel.title: ~.Hoster Help.~
channel.description:
Hey I have a server which is currently running from hamachi. Which as every one knows, is very annoying and time wasting. I would make it non-hamachi but my router can't port forward. Its a GT724-WG. Its not listed on portforward.com so I have no idea how to get port forwarding up and running. Yes im pretty sure that there is a way to get it working but im no good with any of that kinda stuff :confused: only good with coding servers. (Not to brag). Anyways, if someone would like to host for my server, obviously they would be admin/co-owner in game, then please reply or contact me on the forums ~ * Link removed.
Need to be able to port forward the server, and have at lease basic knowledge of coding. Theres a few vids on youtube on the server, just search failscape private server. Server info-317, lots of customs, D claws, D plate, all that good stuff Xd.
Also im not sure if this is against the rules :eek: so if it is sorry i wasnt aware. Kinda new to MoparScape.

item.title: ~.Hoster Help.~
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

You can’t request a coder here.
And you already posted this in server development, don’t double post please.

Read full topic

item.title: ~.Hoster Help.~
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

maxmurks:

only good with coding servers. (Not to brag).

Quick, whats an array. Get it right and I will help you.

Read full topic
